name: BigFileTransfers
description: Upload and download very large files (up to ~2GB) by seamlessly splitting them into smaller chunks and merging them back together. Works best when both sender and receiver use the plugin (alternatively: use the companion web page to merge the chunks - https://pharaoh2k.github.io/BetterDiscordStuff/Merger/)
author: Pharaoh2k
features: Upload files up to ~2GB by automatically splitting into chunks
Automatic chunk sending with configurable delays
Seamless reassembly on download with progress tracking
Low memory mode - stream downloads directly to disk
Context menu integration for downloads and fragment deletion
Copy all chunk URLs to clipboard
Works within Discord's upload limits (doesn't bypass)
Real-time progress indicators for uploads and downloads
Support for up to 200 chunks per file
Automatic message backfill for missing chunks
Discord theme integration for seamless UI
requirements: Both sender and receiver must have the plugin installed
All chunk messages must be loaded in the channel
Desktop Discord recommended for Low Memory Mode
